## Code of Conduct

By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by the terms of the [Project-wide Code of Conduct statement for Bioconductor][bioconductor-coc].

## Contributions

The source files for this website are publicly available in this [GitHub repository][bioconductor-hacktoberfest2024].

Contributors are welcome to submit pull requests from forks or contact maintainers to gain write access to the repository.
